Vice Park 🔥 Mature Crowd

Vice Park is a dynamic entertainment venue in the heart of Dallas, offering a unique blend of day and night experiences. With its rooftop setting, guests can enjoy panoramic views of the city skyline while dancing to music from renowned DJs. The venue features multiple themed areas, including the Sky Club and Beach Club, each providing a distinct ambiance for patrons.

City: Dallas
Area: Deep Ellum
Category: Day Party
🕒 When to Go: June 18-7p-12a
💰 Cost: $$
Website Map

Babous 🔥 Mature Crowd

Babou's is a luxurious, subterranean cocktail lounge located beneath Hotel Swexan. Inspired by Salvador Dale's pet ocelot, the venue offers a surreal, art-infused atmosphere with live jazz, inventive cocktails, and an opulent setting that invites guests to drink, dance, and discover.

City: Dallas
Area: Uptown
Category: Happy Hour
📅 Days: Thursday
